sentence.Network_en: They have been held in detention since the end of June.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从6月底以来就一直受到监禁。

sentence.Network_en: The teacher kept the boys in detention after school.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师将这些男生课后留堂。

sentence.Network_en: He said that he was not tortured or maltreated during his detention.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说自己在押期间并未遭受拷问和虐待。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'withholding of what is claimed or due'): from late Latin detentio(n-), from Latin detinere 'hold back' (see detain)

entry.tran: (尤指出于政治原因的)拘留，扣押，监禁
entry.def: Detention is when someone is arrested or put into prison, especially for political reasons.

example.ex: ...the detention without trial of government critics...
example.tran: 对政府批评者未经审讯的关押

example.ex: They have been held in detention since the end of June...
example.tran: 他们从6月底以来就一直受到监禁。

entry.tran: (惩罚顽皮学童的)放学后留校
entry.def: Detention is a punishment for naughty schoolchildren, who are made to stay at school after the other children have gone home.

example.ex: The teacher kept the boys in detention after school.
example.tran: 老师将这些男生课后留堂。

means.word_mean: 1. a state of being confined (usually for a short time);

sentences.sentence: "he is in the custody of police"

means.word_mean: 2. a punishment in which a student must stay at school after others have gone home;

auth_sentence.content: She has been in near continuous detention ever since.
auth_sentence.res_content: She has been in near continuous detention ever since.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She has been in near continuous detention ever since.

auth_sentence.content: Such detention is contrary to the rule of law.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such detention is contrary to the rule of law.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such detention is contrary to the rule of law.

auth_sentence.content: Pre-trial detention had worsened her condition, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pre-trial detention had worsened her condition, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pre-trial detention had worsened her condition, he said.

sentences.en: He was kept in detention by the police.
He was held in detention from 1991 to 2009.
sentences.cn: 他从1991年到2009 年一直被监禁。
